translations.translation: when the worst of them rushed ahead,
When among them the great wretch arose,
when their arch-criminal rose up in rage.
when the most corrupt of them incited them (to commit evil).
When the most wicked among them stood up in defiance.
When their most wicked went forth.
When the most unfortunate of them broke forth with
when the most wretched of them uprose,
When the basest of them broke forth
when the most wicked man among them rose up.
What time the greatest wretch of them rose up.
when the most wretched of them rose up.
Behold, the most wicked man among them was deputed (for impiety).
When the most wicked man among them went forth (to kill the she-camel).
when the most wicked of them broke forth,
When it followed its most wicked.
When the most wretched of them was sent forth.
[91:12] when the most wretched of them, whose name was Qudār, was dispatched, [when] he hastened, in order to hamstring the she-camel with their approval.
(When the basest of them broke forth) when the most wretched of the folk, Qudar Ibn Salif and Masda', hamstrung the she-camel.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وذلك أنهم قد بالغوا في العتو والعناد والتكذيب والإفساد، سيما وقت { إِذِ ٱنبَعَثَ } أي: قام وأقدم مسرعاً { أَشْقَاهَا } [الشمس: 12] أي: أشقى القبيلة وأرداها وأضلَّها عن طريق الحق - وهو: قدار بن سالف - إلى عقر الناقة المعهودة المحفوظة المخصوصة بالوصية الإلهية
